produkterAlle: SELECT pak_products.prodid, pak_articles.stockid, pak_products.prodname, pak_products.pshortdesc, pak_products.supplier, pak_products.pisapproved, iso.isocode, iso.isotitle, iso.isotextshort, iso.isactive FROM [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_products] INNER JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_prodiso] ON pak_products.prodid = pak_prodiso.prodid AND pak_products.ldbid = pak_prodiso.ldbid INNER JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[iso] ON pak_prodiso.isocode = iso.isocode AND pak_prodiso.ldbid = iso.ldbid INNER JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_articles] ON pak_products.ldbid = pak_articles.ldbid AND pak_products.prodid = pak_articles.prodid where (pak_products.parchive is NULL) and pak_products.prodid in (select prodid from [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_products] where ldbid=2) and pak_products.prodid in (select prodid from [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_articles] where ldbid=2)
produkterAlleAktive: SELECT pak_products.prodid, pak_articles.stockid, pak_products.prodname, pak_products.pshortdesc, pak_products.supplier, pak_products.pisapproved, iso.isocode, iso.isotitle, iso.isotextshort, iso.isactive FROM [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_products] INNER JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_prodiso] ON pak_products.prodid = pak_prodiso.prodid AND pak_products.ldbid = pak_prodiso.ldbid INNER JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[iso] ON pak_prodiso.isocode = iso.isocode AND pak_prodiso.ldbid = iso.ldbid INNER JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_articles] ON pak_products.ldbid = pak_articles.ldbid AND pak_products.prodid = pak_articles.prodid where (pak_products.parchive is NULL) and pak_products.prodid in (select prodid from [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_products] where ldbid=2) and pak_products.prodid in (select prodid from [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_articles] where ldbid=2) and iso.isactive=1
produkterAlleAktiveMedNAVAvtale: SELECT a.stockid,a.artid,a.prodid,a.artno,a.artname,a.adescshort,e.prodname,e.pshortdesc,a.aindate,a.aoutdate,a.ldbid,a.aout,a.aisapproved,a.anbudid,a.hasanbud,a.adraft,b.artpostid,b.apostid,b.postrank,c.apostnr,c.aposttitle,c.apostdesc,c.newsid,TRIM(CONCAT('https://www.hjelpemiddeldatabasen.no/blobs/snet/',d.blobfile)) as blobfileURL,TRIM(CONCAT('https://www.hjelpemiddeldatabasen.no/blobs/orig/',d.blobfile)) as blobfileURL_snet,d.blobtype,d.blobuse,e.supplier, e.pisapproved,g.isocode,g.isotitle,g.isotextshort,g.isactive FROM [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_articles] a INNER JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_artpost] b ON a.artid = b.artid INNER JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[hmiavtaleposter] c ON b.apostid = c.apostid INNER JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_blobprodfiles] d ON a.prodid = d.prodid INNER JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_products] e ON a.prodid = e.prodid INNER JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_prodiso] f ON a.prodid = f.prodid INNER JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[iso] g ON g.isocode = f.isocode WHERE(a.ldbid=2 and b.ldbid = 2 and c.ldbid=2 and d.ldbid=2 and e.ldbid=2 and f.ldbid=2 and g.ldbid=2 and a.aisapproved= 1 and a.aout= 0 and g.isactive=1 and (d.blobuse='1')) ORDER BY a.stockid;
produkterAlleAktiveNAVAVtaleTechData: SELECT a.prodid, a.artid, j.techlabeldk, h.datavalue, i.techdataunit FROM [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_articles] a FULL JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_artpost] b ON a.artid = b.artid FULL JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[hmiavtaleposter] c ON b.apostid = c.apostid  FULL JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_datas] h ON a.artid = h.artid FULL JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[techdata] i ON h.techdataid = i.id FULL JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[techlabel] j ON i.techlabelid = j.id WHERE (a.ldbid=2 and b.ldbid=2 and c.ldbid=2 and h.ldbid=2 and i.ldbid=2 and j.ldbid=2 and a.aisapproved= 1 and a.aout= 0) Group by a.prodid, a.artid, j.techlabeldk, h.datavalue, i.techdataunit, i.techdatasort ORDER BY a.artid, i.techdatasort;
produktTest: SELECT pak_products.prodid, pak_products.prodname, pak_products.pshortdesc, pak_products.supplier, iso.isocode, iso.isotitle, adr_adresser.adressnamn1, iso.isotextshort FROM [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_products] INNER JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_prodiso] ON pak_products.prodid = pak_prodiso.prodid AND pak_products.ldbid = pak_prodiso.ldbid INNER JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[iso] ON pak_prodiso.isocode = iso.isocode AND pak_prodiso.ldbid = iso.ldbid INNER JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[adr_adresser] ON pak_products.ldbid = adr_adresser.ldbid AND pak_products.supplier = adr_adresser.adressid where (pak_products.parchive is NULL) and pak_products.prodid in (select prodid from [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_products] where ldbid=2) and pak_products.prodid in (select prodid from [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_articles] where ldbid=2 and stockid=191232) and iso.isactive=1
produktX: SELECT pak_products.prodid, pak_articles.stockid, pak_products.prodname, pak_products.pshortdesc, pak_products.supplier, iso.isocode, iso.isotitle, adr_adresser.adressnamn1, iso.isotextshort FROM [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_products] INNER JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_prodiso] ON pak_products.prodid = pak_prodiso.prodid AND pak_products.ldbid = pak_prodiso.ldbid INNER JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[iso] ON pak_prodiso.isocode = iso.isocode AND pak_prodiso.ldbid = iso.ldbid INNER JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_articles] ON pak_products.ldbid = pak_articles.ldbid AND pak_products.prodid = pak_articles.prodid INNER JOIN [HMSDB].[dbo].[adr_adresser] ON pak_products.ldbid = adr_adresser.ldbid AND pak_products.supplier = adr_adresser.adressid where (pak_products.parchive is NULL) and pak_products.prodid in (select prodid from [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_products] where ldbid=2) and pak_products.prodid in (select prodid from [HMSDB].[dbo].[pak_articles] where ldbid=2 and stockid=hmsartnr) and iso.isactive=1
